body: So some of you guys have this fancy border with the fancy bubbles that you put in that have your name, Skype etc... How do u guys do that? I know how to code basic stuff, like center a paragraph, or put in an image. The websites don't help at all because none of the codes work on here. So if anyone can give me some tips/help it'll mean a lot :P

title: HTML Help

replies.body: you can use Google Chrome, right click on a certain HTML fancy work, click "Inspect Element", and look at the coding done to obtain those fancy HTML work. I do it sometimes just to have a look and learn from it c;
